casebody.data:
Richard PERNICIARO & Robert Cleveland, Individually and on Behalf of ParaTech, LLC
v.
Guy MCINNIS, Ray Lauga, Jr., Casey W. Hunnicutt, Richard Lewis & St. Bernard Parish Government, et al. NO. 2018-C-1659 Supreme Court of Louisiana. December 17, 2018 Denied. WEIMER, J., recused.

HUGHES, J., would grant in part.
